"Kiss on My List" is a song by the American duo Hall & Oates. It was written by 
Daryl Hall and Janna Allen, and produced by the duo. It was the third single 
release from their ninth studio album, Voices (1980), and became their second 
U.S. Billboard Hot 100 number-one ... While two other songs from the album had 
returned the duo to chart activity,...
